org.datavec.audio.extension

Class Spectrogram

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.datavec.audio.extension.Spectrogram

  • public class Spectrogram
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles the wave data in frequency-time domain.

      • Spectrogram

        public Spectrogram(Wave wave,
           int fftSampleSize,
           int overlapFactor)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        wave -
        fftSampleSize - number of sample in fft, the value needed to be a number to power of 2
        overlapFactor - 1/overlapFactor overlapping, e.g. 1/4=25% overlapping, 0 for no overlapping
